Package care.eka

Class EkaCareClient

java.lang.Object
care.eka.EkaCareClient
public class EkaCareClient extends Object
Main client for interacting with the Eka Care API.

    • EkaCareClient

      public EkaCareClient(String clientId, String clientSecret)
      Create a new EkaCare client.
      Parameters:
      clientId - Your Eka Care API client ID
      clientSecret - Your Eka Care API client secret

    • EkaCareClient

      public EkaCareClient(String clientId, String clientSecret, String baseUrl)
      Create a new EkaCare client with a custom base URL.
      Parameters:
      clientId - Your Eka Care API client ID
      clientSecret - Your Eka Care API client secret
      baseUrl - Base URL for the Eka Care API

    • EkaCareClient

      public EkaCareClient(String clientId, String clientSecret, String baseUrl, String accessToken)
      Create a new EkaCare client with an existing access token.
      Parameters:
      clientId - Your Eka Care API client ID
      clientSecret - Your Eka Care API client secret
      baseUrl - Base URL for the Eka Care API
      accessToken - An existing access token

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode request(String method, String endpoint, Map<String,String> params, Map<String,Object> jsonBody, Map<String,String> headers, boolean authRequired) throws IOException
      Make a request to the Eka Care API.
      Parameters:
      method - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)
      endpoint - API endpoint path
      params - Query parameters
      jsonBody - JSON body as Map
      headers - Additional headers
      authRequired - Whether auth token is required
      Returns:
      Response as JsonNode
      Throws:
      IOException
